item.title: Can anyone help me on where to put this
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

ok i added this void

public void savePM(byte[] chatmsg, int size, long target) {             
        BufferedWriter bw = null;

      try {
         bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/pm.txt", true));
     bw.write("[" + playerName + " > " + misc.longToPlayerName(target) + "]: " + misc.textUnpack(chatmsg, size));
     bw.newLine();
     bw.flush();
      } catch (IOException ioe) {
     ioe.printStackTrace();
      } finally {
     if (bw != null) try {
        bw.close();
     } catch (IOException ioe2) {
        sendMessage("Error logging pm!");
     }
      }
 }

but i dont know where to add it so it saves all the pm’s can anyone tell me that?

Read full topic
item.source: Can anyone help me on where to put this
